articles.title: Footage of ZeniMax’s Cancelled Project Blackbird Surfaces Online - Insider Gaming
articles.description: Two minutes of in-engine footage of ZeniMax Online Studio's cancelled Project Blackbird has leaked online.

articles.title: Games Workshop Is Finally Making Female Custodes Models - Gizmodo
articles.description: The new models mark the first time tabletop players will be given the option to build their Custodes units with unhelmeted female heads.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Xbox Cloud Gaming is getting ad-supported access VERY soon - Windows Central
articles.description: Users have been noticing that Xbox Cloud Gaming has begun referencing "ad support" while launching games.

articles.title: ReactOS For "Open-Source Windows" Achieves Massive Networking Performance Boost - Phoronix
articles.description: ReactOS as the long-in-development 'open-source Windows' project has been on quite a roll recently

articles.title: Here’s why Walmart still doesn’t support Apple Pay - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Walmart still doesn’t accept Apple Pay (or any NFC tap-to-pay) in U.S. stores. Here are a few reasons why it doesn't.

articles.title: Oregon man buys four 'refurbished' video game consoles from Temu and opens them up to see if they're legit - supercarblondie.com
articles.description: This Oregon man got his hands on four refurbished video game consoles from Temu to have a closer look at whether or not they were worth the investment
